rooms.description: A combined open-plan living and dining space with Mediterranean design elements, featuring high ceilings, exposed beams, and floor-to-ceiling windows. The room is designed to be wheelchair accessible with wider doorways and level thresholds.
Modern Mediterranean kitchen with ample counter space, storage, and natural light. Integrated with the dining area to promote family interaction, designed with wheelchair accessibility in mind.
Compact utility area for storage and laundry, designed with easy access from the kitchen and living space. Wheelchair friendly design.
Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars and non-slip flooring, designed to be Vastu-compliant by placing the water element in the north-eastern part of the space.

A welcoming entrance hall that leads directly into the living area, with a spacious design accommodating wheelchair accessibility. Decorative Mediterranean elements such as tiled flooring and mosaic accents.
Corridor connecting the entrance hall to other rooms on the ground floor, designed with smooth flooring and adequate lighting. Vastu-compliant pathway layout.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and ventilation in keeping with Mediterranean aesthetics.
Wider door for wheelchair accessibility and smooth flow of energy in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom. The layout includes ample natural light and a private balcony, all designed for wheelchair accessibility.
Secondary bedroom designed with Mediterranean influences, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light. Accessible layout.
Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom, with accessible fixtures and Vastu-aligned water element placement.
Private balcony adjoining the master bedroom, designed with Mediterranean style and floor-to-ceiling railings. Wheelchair accessible ramp integration.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring natural light and Vastu-compliant energy flow.
Wider door design for wheelchair accessibility and maintaining Vastu flow.
